3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent dimensional transformation and isometric projection. Highly legible interior volume.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room configuration and adjacency are perfect. Minor variation in wall thickness/proportions compared to 2D line weights.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture, bathroom fixtures, and kitchen layout are accurately translated and placed.

visual_clarity.notes: Structural clarity is high, but score is reduced due to high volume of text labels carried over into the 3D space, which clutters the presentation.

detected_errors.description: Room labels and square footage text present in 3D rendering.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains high geometric fidelity and accurate furniture placement from the original floor plan.
